data.text: Jisu le asiamruoi ngai'n Gerasene ramsuungnga kaom, Galilee tuidiilpang khattiang inhongtung phakhan,
Jisu'n rakuongnga inphut ajuochumli chummak thaan billa inphut aheikasuok miring inkhat alei-intongpui. Hiwa miringpa suungnga ratha kathamak kha aleiom
khat-um thaanbilla aleiom. Tu inkhat innum amahi woini kahuuiya thirruiya khit-ah damatormu;
Akutli akeii ngaihi inleikhit, takkha inleikhit racham thirrui kha aleimachat halli thirkha akeiiya aleitouthaak. Tu inkhat innum innuoiya leidamatormu ajarchu ama ranak ngar.
Ama'n suunli zaan boiya thaanbil kha akuoitong halli chingnga aleiloon, akheek-ah atheinuo-ah lungnga alei-insukchat.
Ama'n Jisu kha kalaak-ah aleimu; halli ama'n aheitanna, Jisu maikuungnga kemurkhup thep-ah chubei ajuotho,
halli rasa inringnga akheek-ah aleiti, “Jisu, Insaangkhet Pathian Sapa! Angme keidiang nimanuom? Kei'n Pathian ramingnga kanani, kei naminpoong maro!”
Ama'n hiwahi aleiti ajarchu Jisu'n aleiti, “Ratha kathamak, hiwa mipa diangnga inphut heisuokro!”
Khawa jarra Jisu'n amadiang aleirakel, “Naraming ang intime?”
Halli ama'n Jisu diang ratha kathamak ngaihi khawa ramma inphut napuutpi maro tia inlet inlet-ah aleiti.
Khawakhan wok rahooi yam chingthut khan inbak-ah inleiom.
Khawa jarra ratha ngaikhan Jisu diang inleiti, “Wok ngaidiang khan natirru, halli keini'n inmani suungnga luutkinte.”

Ama'n inmani ngaikha aleiminsi, halli mipa diangnga inphut ratha kathamak ngaikha insuok-ah wokngai suungnga inleiluut. Wok rahooi sengkha Wok lising inni in-eii, inraya-ah suktaaktiang sumpalingkhang intho-ah khat-um tuidiil khan inta-ah inleithi.
Wok kakhaal ngaikhan intaanna halli khuopuiya khat-um khuo khuo-ah kaom mi ngaidiang chong ngaihi injuorilpi. Mipui ngaikhan akasuok omchan kha ka-ensik inheiwa.
Khat-um Jisu diang inmani'n inheiwa phakhan, inmani'n raikhuo katam kaluutpa kha, puondiar thoa malungron katha roonna; in-ongnga ileiom kha inleimu, halli inmani rakip in amakha inleichi.
Raikhuo kaluutpa khat-um wok ngaidiang aleikasuok rakip kamu ngai'n mipui diangkhan inleirilpi.
Khawa suoli inmani'n Jisu diang inmani ramkha mathaan inlang sitro inleiti.
Jisu'n rakuong suungnga aluut phakhan, raikhuo kaluut miringpa'n ama diang aleini, “Kei-um nangle sisuomkate!”
Takkha Jisu'n leizootpimak. Khawa rathuulla, amadiang aleiti, “Nang inntiang kir-inlang na-innsuung mi ngaidiang angtuk-ah Pumi Pathian in nang sik-ah inathopi khat-um inaminriang kha rilpiro.”
Khawa jarra ama'n khawa munkha amathaanna Khuopui Soom inti ram (Decapolis) arakaanna, Jisu'n ama sik-ah ileithopi ngaikha aleiril. Halli khawa kajet rakip ngai'n inleingak.
Jisu'n tuidiilpang raaltiang arakaanna aleikir. Khawa tuidiil pangkhan mipui katamtak ama koolla inhei-inchun.
Jairus, khawa ramma Synagogue karoon inkhat aheitung, halli ama'n Jisu kha amupha, Jisu kekuungnga ajuo-inbok
khat-um malung kaluut-ah amadiang aleini, “Alakadoong kasanu kha natheiya om, naheiwapi inlang aring adamnasik nakut-ah najuokatook piro aleiti!”
Halli Jisu'n amale inruoiya kasi inleiphut. Khawa jarra mipui katamtak in Jisu nuk injuiya amakha inlei-uum.
Khawakhan kumsoomleini thikasarra chikaom rirai karoon numeisa inkhat aleiom,
Kathiam angjet in akana numeisanu kha inlei-en. Ama sialsum rakip aleineiman suojei, takkha kadamsik rathuulla ina kha apha rakip-ah hongkheelsit.
Khawa numeisanu in Jisu athang ala aleijet-ah, ama nukkha mipui karra aheijui,
khawa numeisanu khan atheinuo-ah inti, “Kei'n ama puonmor kakatook inchu, kei kadamsik eii.”
Ama'n Jisu puonmor aleikatook, akatookli katookmak ama thikasar kha aleikhak; khawakhan ama'n atheinuo-ah kinahi kadamjei tia alei-injet.
Khawa phakhan Jisu'n ama diangnga aranak isuok kha ajet-ah, Ama'n mipui karra ahei-inlet-ah aleirakel, “Tume kei kapuon kakatook?”
Ama siamruoi ngai'n inleimasang, “Mipui'n nang inna-uumhi namu; angjarra nang in tume kei kanakatook nitime?”
Takkha Jisu'n tu ithome jetsik tia asir apang alei-en.
Numeisanu khan ama diangnga kasuok kha aleijet, khawa jarra kachi khat-um intuulle inruoiya aheiwa-ah Jisu kekuungnga ajuo-inbok, halli akadik rakip kha ama diang aleirilpi.
Jisu'n numeisanu diang aleiti, “Kasanu, nang ngamna khan nang nadamjei. Kahoi kadaiya sitro, halli napoongna makheiya kadam kha etro.”
Hiwahi Jisu'n atilai takkhan, lamkakei Jairus inna inphut chongkachoi lekkhat inhongnga Jairus diang inhongti, “Nasanu kha athijei. Angsikme Karu kha nilakacher?”
Angme inmani itikha Jisu'n leirangai pimak5:36. leirangai pimak emakli leira-ngai pimak., takkha lamkakeipa diang aleiti, “Chimaro, ngamnabit ngamnaro.”
Khanna inphutchu Peter, James halli anai John elekleiya tu inkhat-um anuk kajuisik-ah leizootpimakjei.
Inmani'n synagogue lamkakei Jairus inna inleitung, khawakhan Jisu'n thodan jetmuwa inkheek-ah khat-um inwaiya kachap ngaikha aleimu.
Ama'n innsuung aluut-ah inmani diang aleiti, “Angtia thodan ningjet makme? Angsik ame ningchap? Naipangnu hi akathi emak, takkha akazaal keeng!”
Inmani'n ama kha inlei innuipui, khawa jarra ama'n inmani rakip tuolla aleiminsuok, asiamruoi inthumle khat-um naipangnu nuli pa aruoiya, naipangnu zaalnatiang khan inleiluut.
Ama'n naipangnu kutkhan amahuumma aleiti, “Talitha, Koum,”  tinachu, “Alakasiin naipangnu, kei'n kati nang intheitro!”
Khawapha takkhan ama'n intheiya asi aleihong. (Numeisanu kha kum soomleini alei eii.) Hiwa inmupha khan, inmani'n inthiangnga inleingak.
Takkha Jisu'n tu diang-um rilpimaru tia chong kangar kha inmani diang aleipeii, halli ama'n aleiti, “Numeisanu diang baksik lekkhat peru.”
